cards.title: Magnificent Mara
powers: {MagnificentMara} deals 1 target 1 psychic damage, that target deals another target 1 melee damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may put a card from their trash on top of their deck.
Select a target. Until the start of your next turn that target is immune to damage from environment cards.

openingLines.default: We have an audience! Let's make some magic.

cards.title: Abracadabra!
body: When a non-character card belonging to another hero is destroyed, you may return it to that player's hand. If you do, destroy this card.
When this card is destroyed, one player may play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: But I saw Baron{BR}Blade destroy it!

cards.title: Convincing Double
cards.body: Select a player. That player passes a one-shot card to another player, who then puts that card into play as if it were their card, treating any hero name on the card as the name of their hero instead.

flavorQuotes.text: Alright, I'll lead them away. You{BR}better not make me regret this.

cards.title: Dowsing Crystal
powers: Once before your next turn when a non-hero card enters play, one hero target may deal a non-hero target 2 damage of a type of their choosing. You may destroy this card to increase that damage by 2.

flavorQuotes.text: Didn't I see you in Vegas?

cards.title: Glimpse of Things to Come
body: Reveal the top card of the Villain deck, then replace it.
You may draw a card.
You may play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Hey, what's the matter with you?

cards.title: Hand is Faster than the Eye
cards.body: When a non-relic, non-character villain card would activate start of turn or end of turn text, destroy it instead. Then, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Oops, I guess this{BR}doohickey was important.

cards.title: Improbable Escape
body: When a hero character is reduced to 0 or fewer HP, restore them to 2 HP, then destroy this card.
When this card or any of your ongoing cards are destroyed you may draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Quit complaining and take a bow.

cards.title: Kalpak of Mysteries
powers: Reveal the top card of each other hero deck. One player may put their revealed card into their hand or into play. Replace or discard the other revealed cards. If a card is put into play this way, destroy this card.

cards.title: Looking for this?
body: One player may return one of their non-character cards in play to their hand.
If they do, they may select a card in their trash that shares a keyword with that card and put it into play.

cards.title: Mesmer Pendant
body: Play this card next to a non-character target.
When that card would cause damage to a hero target, redirect it to a villain target that hasn't been damaged this way this turn.
When it would destroy a hero ongoing, prevent it and destroy a villain ongoing.
At the start of your turn destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: Frost noticed that she{BR}carefully avoided touching the eye{BR}itself. Behind the laughter and stagecraft{BR}he caught a sense of unease.

cards.title: Misdirection
body: {MagnificentMara} deals 1 target 1 sonic damage.
One other hero target deals that same target 2 damage of a type of their choosing.

cards.title: Mix it up
body: Destroy 1 hero ongoing card, equipment card, or environment card.
If you do, reveal the top 2 cards of the associated deck, put one into play and discard the other.

flavorQuotes.text: Remember him? He's{BR}a big fan of yours.

cards.title: Mystical Enhancement
body: Play this card next to a card with a power on it.
Increase damage dealt by that power by 1.
If that card would be destroyed, destroy this card instead.

flavorQuotes.text: Well, you're a Sagittarius,{BR}and your chief element...is fire.

cards.title: Post-Hypnotic Cue
body: Play this card next to a hero. When this card is destroyed, that hero may use a power.
At the start of your turn you may destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Sorry, I blanked for{BR}a second there. What happened?

cards.title: Smoke and Mirrors
cards.body: When a hero target would be dealt damage, you may prevent that damage. If you do, destroy this card.

cards.title: Wand of Banishment
cards.body: When a non-character card from another deck would be destroyed, you may put it on the top or bottom of its deck instead. If you do, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: She can really make{BR}a crowd disappear.

unimplementableCards.title: Mesmer Pendant
body: Play this card next to a non-character target. Treat the words 'Hero Target', 'Hero Ongoing', and 'Non-Villain target' on that card as 'Villain Target', 'Villain Ongoing' and 'Non-Hero target' instead.
At the start of your turn destroy this card.
unimplementableCards.flavorText: Frost noticed that she{BR}carefully avoided touching the eye{BR}itself. Behind the laughter and stagecraft{BR}he caught a sense of unease.

promoCards.title: Magnificent Mara
promoCards.promoTitle: Ministry Of Strategic Science Magnificent Mara
powers: {MagnificentMara} deals 1 target 2 radiant damage. Increase damage dealt by that target by 1 until the start of your next turn.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card now.
Reduce the next damage dealt to a hero target by 2.
The next time a hero ongoing card is destroyed, put that card in its owner's hand.

openingLines.default: Wouldn't you know it, I'm sensing a threatening presence. Right over there.
openingLines.MythosCharacter: I don't think so. That 'little crystal' points out trouble, which is what you're in!

promoCards.title: Magnificent Mara
powers: One player may play a relic card. Another may move a relic from their trash to the top of their deck. If neither happens, draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One target deals another target 1 melee damage.
Put a card in a trash pile under its associated deck.
One player selects a keyword and reveals the top 3 cards of their deck, putting any revealed cards with that keyword into their hand and discarding the rest.

openingLines.default: Excuse me, let's keep it classy!
openingLines.TheMistressOfFateCharacter: I've escaped from plenty of traps. This should be easy!
openingLines.PastTheRamCharacter: Sort of: I'm here to make you disappear.
